text.ascii: dhRtarASTra uvAca
text.ur: dhr̥tarāṣṭra uvāca

text.ascii: kathaM gacchati kaunteyo dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: kathaṁ gacchati kaunteyo dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: bhImasenaH savyasAcI mAdrIputrau ca tAv ubhau
text.ur: bhīmasenaḥ savyasācī mādrīputrau ca tāv ubhau

text.ascii: dhaumyaz caiva kathaM kSattar draupadI vA tapasvinI
text.ur: dhaumyaś caiva kathaṁ kṣattar draupadī vā tapasvinī

text.ascii: zrotum icchAmy ahaM sarvaM teSAm aGgaviceSTitam
text.ur: śrotum icchāmy ahaṁ sarvaṁ teṣām aṅgaviceṣṭitam

text.ascii: vidura uvAca
text.ur: vidura uvāca

text.ascii: vastreNa saMvRtya mukhaM kuntIputro yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: vastreṇa saṁvr̥tya mukhaṁ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: bAhU vizAlau kRtvA tu bhImo gacchati pANDavaH
text.ud: बाहू विशालौ कृत्वा तु भीमो गच्छति पाण्डवः
text.ur: bāhū viśālau kr̥tvā tu bhīmo gacchati pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: sikatA vapan savyasAcI rAjAnam anugacchati
text.ur: sikatā vapan savyasācī rājānam anugacchati

text.ascii: mAdrIputraH sahadevo mukham Alipya gacchati
text.ur: mādrīputraḥ sahadevo mukham ālipya gacchati

text.ascii: pAMsUpaliptasarvAGgo nakulaz cittavihvalaH
text.ur: pāṁsūpaliptasarvāṅgo nakulaś cittavihvalaḥ

text.ascii: darzanIyatamo loke rAjAnam anugacchati
text.ur: darśanīyatamo loke rājānam anugacchati

text.ascii: kRSNA kezaiH praticchAdya mukham AyatalocanA
text.ur: kr̥ṣṇā keśaiḥ praticchādya mukham āyatalocanā

text.ascii: darzanIyA prarudatI rAjAnam anugacchati
text.ur: darśanīyā prarudatī rājānam anugacchati

text.ascii: dhaumyo yAmyAni sAmAni raudrANi ca vizAM pate
text.ud: धौम्यो याम्यानि सामानि रौद्राणि च विशां पते
text.ur: dhaumyo yāmyāni sāmāni raudrāṇi ca viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: gAyan gacchati mArgeSu kuzAn AdAya pANinA
text.ur: gāyan gacchati mārgeṣu kuśān ādāya pāṇinā

text.ascii: dhRtarASTra uvAca
text.ur: dhr̥tarāṣṭra uvāca

text.ascii: vividhAnIha rUpANi kRtvA gacchanti pANDavAH
text.ur: vividhānīha rūpāṇi kr̥tvā gacchanti pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: tan mamAcakSva vidura kasmAd evaM vrajanti te
text.ur: tan mamācakṣva vidura kasmād evaṁ vrajanti te

text.ascii: vidura uvAca
text.ur: vidura uvāca

text.ascii: nikRtasyApi te putrair hRte rAjye dhaneSu ca
text.ud: निकृतस्यापि ते पुत्रैर्हृते राज्ये धनेषु च
text.ur: nikr̥tasyāpi te putrair hr̥te rājye dhaneṣu ca

text.ascii: na dharmAc calate buddhir dharmarAjasya dhImataH
text.ur: na dharmāc calate buddhir dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ

text.ascii: yo 'sau rAjA ghRNI nityaM dhArtarASTreSu bhArata
text.ud: योऽसौ राजा घृणी नित्यं धार्तराष्ट्रेषु भारत
text.ur: yo ’sau rājā ghr̥ṇī nityaṁ dhārtarāṣṭreṣu bhārata

text.ascii: nikRtyA krodhasaMtapto nonmIlayati locane
text.ur: nikr̥tyā krodhasaṁtapto nonmīlayati locane

text.ascii: nAhaM janaM nirdaheyaM dRSTvA ghoreNa cakSuSA
text.ud: नाहं जनं निर्दहेयं दृष्ट्वा घोरेण चक्षुषा
text.ur: nāhaṁ janaṁ nirdaheyaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā

text.ascii: sa pidhAya mukhaM rAjA tasmAd gacchati pANDavaH
text.ud: स पिधाय मुखं राजा तस्माद्गच्छति पाण्डवः
text.ur: sa pidhāya mukhaṁ rājā tasmād gacchati pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: yathA ca bhImo vrajati tan me nigadataH zRNu
text.ud: यथा च भीमो व्रजति तन्मे निगदतः शृणु
text.ur: yathā ca bhīmo vrajati tan me nigadataḥ śr̥ṇu

text.ascii: bAhvor bale nAsti samo mameti bharatarSabha
text.ur: bāhvor bale nāsti samo mameti bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: bAhU vizAlau kRtvA tu tena bhImo 'pi gacchati
text.ud: बाहू विशालौ कृत्वा तु तेन भीमोऽपि गच्छति
text.ur: bāhū viśālau kr̥tvā tu tena bhīmo ’pi gacchati

text.ascii: bAhU darzayamAno hi bAhudraviNadarpitaH
text.ur: bāhū darśayamāno hi bāhudraviṇadarpitaḥ

text.ascii: cikIrSan karma zatrubhyo bAhudravyAnurUpataH
text.ur: cikīrṣan karma śatrubhyo bāhudravyānurūpataḥ

text.ascii: pradizaJ zarasaMpAtAn kuntIputro 'rjunas tadA
text.ur: pradiśañ śarasaṁpātān kuntīputro ’rjunas tadā

text.ascii: sikatA vapan savyasAcI rAjAnam anugacchati
text.ur: sikatā vapan savyasācī rājānam anugacchati

text.ascii: asaktAH sikatAs tasya yathA saMprati bhArata
text.ur: asaktāḥ sikatās tasya yathā saṁprati bhārata

text.ascii: asaktaM zaravarSANi tathA mokSyati zatruSu
text.ur: asaktaṁ śaravarṣāṇi tathā mokṣyati śatruṣu

text.ascii: na me kaz cid vijAnIyAn mukham adyeti bhArata
text.ur: na me kaś cid vijānīyān mukham adyeti bhārata

text.ascii: mukham Alipya tenAsau sahadevo 'pi gacchati
text.ur: mukham ālipya tenāsau sahadevo ’pi gacchati

text.ascii: nAhaM manAMsy AdadeyaM mArge strINAm iti prabho
text.ur: nāhaṁ manāṁsy ādadeyaṁ mārge strīṇām iti prabho

text.ascii: pAMsUpacitasarvAGgo nakulas tena gacchati
text.ur: pāṁsūpacitasarvāṅgo nakulas tena gacchati

text.ascii: ekavastrA tu rudatI muktakezI rajasvalA
text.ur: ekavastrā tu rudatī muktakeśī rajasvalā

text.ascii: zoNitAktArdravasanA draupadI vAkyam abravIt
text.ur: śoṇitāktārdravasanā draupadī vākyam abravīt

text.ascii: yatkRte 'ham imAM prAptA teSAM varSe caturdaze
text.ur: yatkr̥te ’ham imāṁ prāptā teṣāṁ varṣe caturdaśe

text.ascii: hatapatyo hatasutA hatabandhujanapriyAH
text.ur: hatapatyo hatasutā hatabandhujanapriyāḥ

text.ascii: bandhuzoNitadigdhAGgyo muktakezyo rajasvalAH
text.ur: bandhuśoṇitadigdhāṅgyo muktakeśyo rajasvalāḥ

text.ascii: evaM kRtodakA nAryaH pravekSyanti gajAhvayam
text.ur: evaṁ kr̥todakā nāryaḥ pravekṣyanti gajāhvayam

text.ascii: kRtvA tu nairRtAn darbhAn dhIro dhaumyaH purohitaH
text.ur: kr̥tvā tu nairr̥tān darbhān dhīro dhaumyaḥ purohitaḥ

text.ascii: sAmAni gAyan yAmyAni purato yAti bhArata
text.ur: sāmāni gāyan yāmyāni purato yāti bhārata

text.ascii: hateSu bhArateSv Ajau kurUNAM guravas tadA
text.ur: hateṣu bhārateṣv ājau kurūṇāṁ guravas tadā

text.ascii: evaM sAmAni gAsyantIty uktvA dhaumyo 'pi gacchati
text.ur: evaṁ sāmāni gāsyantīty uktvā dhaumyo ’pi gacchati

text.ascii: hA hA gacchanti no nAthAH samavekSadhvam IdRzam
text.ud: हा हा गच्छन्ति नो नाथाः समवेक्षध्वमीदृशम्
text.ur: hā hā gacchanti no nāthāḥ samavekṣadhvam īdr̥śam

text.ascii: iti paurAH suduHkhArtAH krozanti sma samantataH
text.ud: इति पौराः सुदुःखार्ताः क्रोशन्ति स्म समन्ततः
text.ur: iti paurāḥ suduḥkhārtāḥ krośanti sma samantataḥ

text.ascii: evam AkAraliGgais te vyavasAyaM manogatam
text.ur: evam ākāraliṅgais te vyavasāyaṁ manogatam

text.ascii: kathayantaH sma kaunteyA vanaM jagmur manasvinaH
text.ur: kathayantaḥ sma kaunteyā vanaṁ jagmur manasvinaḥ

text.ascii: evaM teSu narAgryeSu niryatsu gajasAhvayAt
text.ur: evaṁ teṣu narāgryeṣu niryatsu gajasāhvayāt

text.ascii: anabhre vidyutaz cAsan bhUmiz ca samakampata
text.ur: anabhre vidyutaś cāsan bhūmiś ca samakampata

text.ascii: rAhur agrasad Adityam aparvaNi vizAM pate
text.ur: rāhur agrasad ādityam aparvaṇi viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: ulkA cApy apasavyaM tu puraM kRtvA vyazIryata
text.ud: उल्का चाप्यपसव्यं तु पुरं कृत्वा व्यशीर्यत
text.ur: ulkā cāpy apasavyaṁ tu puraṁ kr̥tvā vyaśīryata

text.ascii: pravyAharanti kravyAdA gRdhragomAyuvAyasAH
text.ur: pravyāharanti kravyādā gr̥dhragomāyuvāyasāḥ

text.ascii: devAyatanacaityeSu prAkArATTAlakeSu ca
text.ur: devāyatanacaityeṣu prākārāṭṭālakeṣu ca

text.ascii: evam ete mahotpAtA vanaM gacchati pANDave
text.ur: evam ete mahotpātā vanaṁ gacchati pāṇḍave

text.ascii: bhAratAnAm abhAvAya rAjan durmantrite tava
text.ur: bhāratānām abhāvāya rājan durmantrite tava

text.ascii: nAradaz ca sabhAmadhye kurUNAm agrataH sthitaH
text.ur: nāradaś ca sabhāmadhye kurūṇām agrataḥ sthitaḥ

text.ascii: maharSibhiH parivRto raudraM vAkyam uvAca ha
text.ur: maharṣibhiḥ parivr̥to raudraṁ vākyam uvāca ha

text.ascii: itaz caturdaze varSe vinaGkSyantIha kauravAH
text.ur: itaś caturdaśe varṣe vinaṅkṣyantīha kauravāḥ

text.ascii: duryodhanAparAdhena bhImArjunabalena ca
text.ur: duryodhanāparādhena bhīmārjunabalena ca

text.ascii: ity uktvA divam Akramya kSipram antaradhIyata
text.ur: ity uktvā divam ākramya kṣipram antaradhīyata

text.ascii: brAhmIM zriyaM suvipulAM bibhrad devarSisattamaH
text.ur: brāhmīṁ śriyaṁ suvipulāṁ bibhrad devarṣisattamaḥ

text.ascii: tato duryodhanaH karNaH zakuniz cApi saubalaH
text.ur: tato duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ

text.ascii: droNaM dvIpam amanyanta rAjyaM cAsmai nyavedayan
text.ur: droṇaṁ dvīpam amanyanta rājyaṁ cāsmai nyavedayan

text.ascii: athAbravIt tato droNo duryodhanam amarSaNam
text.ur: athābravīt tato droṇo duryodhanam amarṣaṇam

text.ascii: duHzAsanaM ca karNaM ca sarvAn eva ca bhAratAn
text.ud: दुःशासनं च कर्णं च सर्वानेव च भारतान्
text.ur: duḥśāsanaṁ ca karṇaṁ ca sarvān eva ca bhāratān

text.ascii: avadhyAn pANDavAn Ahur devaputrAn dvijAtayaH
text.ur: avadhyān pāṇḍavān āhur devaputrān dvijātayaḥ

text.ascii: ahaM tu zaraNaM prAptAn vartamAno yathAbalam
text.ur: ahaṁ tu śaraṇaṁ prāptān vartamāno yathābalam

text.ascii: gatAn sarvAtmanA bhaktyA dhArtarASTrAn sarAjakAn
text.ur: gatān sarvātmanā bhaktyā dhārtarāṣṭrān sarājakān

text.ascii: notsahe samabhityaktuM daivamUlam ataH param
text.ur: notsahe samabhityaktuṁ daivamūlam ataḥ param

text.ascii: dharmataH pANDuputrA vai vanaM gacchanti nirjitAH
text.ud: धर्मतः पाण्डुपुत्रा वै वनं गच्छन्ति निर्जिताः
text.ur: dharmataḥ pāṇḍuputrā vai vanaṁ gacchanti nirjitāḥ

text.ascii: te ca dvAdaza varSANi vane vatsyanti kauravAH
text.ud: ते च द्वादश वर्षाणि वने वत्स्यन्ति कौरवाः
text.ur: te ca dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane vatsyanti kauravāḥ

text.ascii: caritabrahmacaryAz ca krodhAmarSavazAnugAH
text.ur: caritabrahmacaryāś ca krodhāmarṣavaśānugāḥ

text.ascii: vairaM pratyAnayiSyanti mama duHkhAya pANDavAH
text.ur: vairaṁ pratyānayiṣyanti mama duḥkhāya pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: mayA tu bhraMzito rAjyAd drupadaH sakhivigrahe
text.ur: mayā tu bhraṁśito rājyād drupadaḥ sakhivigrahe

text.ascii: putrArtham ayajat krodhAd vadhAya mama bhArata
text.ur: putrārtham ayajat krodhād vadhāya mama bhārata

text.ascii: yAjopayAjatapasA putraM lebhe sa pAvakAt
text.ur: yājopayājatapasā putraṁ lebhe sa pāvakāt

text.ascii: dhRSTadyumnaM draupadIM ca vedImadhyAt sumadhyamAm
text.ur: dhr̥ṣṭadyumnaṁ draupadīṁ ca vedīmadhyāt sumadhyamām

text.ascii: jvAlAvarNo devadatto dhanuSmAn kavacI zarI
text.ur: jvālāvarṇo devadatto dhanuṣmān kavacī śarī

text.ascii: martyadharmatayA tasmAd iti mAM bhayam Avizat
text.ur: martyadharmatayā tasmād iti māṁ bhayam āviśat

text.ascii: gato hi pakSatAM teSAM pArSataH puruSarSabhaH
text.ud: गतो हि पक्षतां तेषां पार्षतः पुरुषर्षभः
text.ur: gato hi pakṣatāṁ teṣāṁ pārṣataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ

text.ascii: sRSTaprANo bhRzataraM tasmAd yotsye tavAribhiH
text.ur: sr̥ṣṭaprāṇo bhr̥śataraṁ tasmād yotsye tavāribhiḥ

text.ascii: madvadhAya zruto hy eSa loke cApy ativizrutaH
text.ur: madvadhāya śruto hy eṣa loke cāpy ativiśrutaḥ

text.ascii: nUnaM so 'yam anuprAptas tvatkRte kAlaparyayaH
text.ur: nūnaṁ so ’yam anuprāptas tvatkr̥te kālaparyayaḥ

text.ascii: tvaritAH kuruta zreyo naitad etAvatA kRtam
text.ur: tvaritāḥ kuruta śreyo naitad etāvatā kr̥tam

text.ascii: muhUrtaM sukham evaitat tAlacchAyeva haimanI
text.ur: muhūrtaṁ sukham evaitat tālacchāyeva haimanī

text.ascii: yajadhvaM ca mahAyajJair bhogAn aznIta datta ca
text.ur: yajadhvaṁ ca mahāyajñair bhogān aśnīta datta ca

text.ascii: itaz caturdaze varSe mahat prApsyatha vaizasam
text.ur: itaś caturdaśe varṣe mahat prāpsyatha vaiśasam

text.ascii: duryodhana nizamyaitat pratipadya yathecchasi
text.ur: duryodhana niśamyaitat pratipadya yathecchasi

text.ascii: sAma vA pANDaveyeSu prayuGkSva yadi manyase
text.ud: साम वा पाण्डवेयेषु प्रयुङ्क्ष्व यदि मन्यसे
text.ur: sāma vā pāṇḍaveyeṣu prayuṅkṣva yadi manyase

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: droNasya vacanaM zrutvA dhRtarASTro 'bravId idam
text.ur: droṇasya vacanaṁ śrutvā dhr̥tarāṣṭro ’bravīd idam

text.ascii: samyag Aha guruH kSattar upAvartaya pANDavAn
text.ur: samyag āha guruḥ kṣattar upāvartaya pāṇḍavān

text.ascii: yadi vA na nivartante satkRtA yAntu pANDavAH
text.ud: यदि वा न निवर्तन्ते सत्कृता यान्तु पाण्डवाः
text.ur: yadi vā na nivartante satkr̥tā yāntu pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: sazastrarathapAdAtA bhogavantaz ca putrakAH
text.ur: saśastrarathapādātā bhogavantaś ca putrakāḥ
